testcase.name: Go to home page with valid creadential
testcase.skipped: Given open Browser..........................................................undefined And navigate to Macys URL...................................................undefined When user click on shop by department button................................undefined And user click on men button................................................undefined And user click on jeans button..............................................undefined Then user should be in mens jeans page......................................undefined And user will click on a pant...............................................undefined And choose a color..........................................................undefined And pick a size.............................................................undefined Then user will add to bag...................................................undefined And user will view bag & checkout...........................................undefined Then again user will click on keep shopping.................................undefined And user will land on Macys home page.......................................undefined
